install_description: Directed  Electronics "Viper" line is our alarm of choice. Along with a lifetime warranty,  they offer the highest quality and are well thought out. Their interfaces are  second to none to make things work flawlessly with today's complex vehicles. We  have also developed specialty alarms to integrate with the factory systems like  our xenon headlight alarm, motorcycle / saddlebags, hood-emblem, work-truck or  anything you can think of alarm. New two-way remotes will page you up to a mile  away if some one is tampering with your vehicle.
